content:
Send a Personalized Customer Greeting with a Formula Template

This article applies to: Messaging for In-App, Messaging for Web, and Bring Your Own Channel.

Before building this recipe, consider these caveats:

* Itâ€™s possible to reference fields from the Messaging Session object or the Messaging User object in an auto-response formula template.
* Salesforce custom object fields are different from pre-chat custom fields. 
 

Create and Map your Fields

* Ensure that you have the desired Salesforce object field set up in your org.
* Create a Pre-Chat form field where the end-user inputs data that travels back to the Salesforce field you identified or created.
* Map your custom pre-chat field to your Salesforce custom field using a flow.

Create Your Auto-Response Component and Formula Template

* Select Auto-Response from the Messaging Component Builder.
* Enter the auto-response, name, and description for your component.
* In the Formula Template field, enter your greeting with parameters that reference the desired Salesforce custom fields.
 
Add the Auto-Response Component to Your Channel

* Find your channel in the list and click Edit.
* Choose whether to add your component to the Start Conversation, End Conversation, or Inactive Conversation fields.
* Test the component in a Messaging for In-App and Web session.
title: Personalized Customer Greeting with Formula Template
